summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Aurora Avenue, from North 72nd Street to North 75th Street, and North 74th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the installation of a street lighting system and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No.9047 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
